text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——Was like BZZAP～. Seriously felt like I got struck by lightning.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Crazy amazin. The freakin cutest. Just my type. 
Was love at first sight, like……… straight to the heart!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
That's why, I wanna make you smile. 
I wanna laugh with you.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ————My love.
*Event title logo displayed.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Sign here to register for Droite～! 
If you're interested, please apply in the classroom～!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Do you all want to participate too? Sorry, it's a bit crowded so, 
can you please wait while the applications are being filed?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Uhm…… I assume you're not going without a date, 
but……. you're not sure who you'll be going with?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Once I've decided, 
I would like to register them as well.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Gotcha～! The application period is pretty long, 
so as soon as you decide, please finish applying!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
No problem, take your time to decide. 
Well then, can you please write your name here?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Alright, registration is complete. If you have any trouble, just let 
me know. ———I hope you can make some wonderful memories.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——Ah, Princess!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Princess～～～～!! 
Parfait time! ! ! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, but I already have plans for dinner. 
———Good day.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Pien! Cold! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
What is this like 100 rejections～～～～? 
It's fine tho～～～～・・・

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: My lady is so mean～～・・・ but so cute～～～! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
HEEEY～! Don't sulk in the middle of the hallway! 
You're in the way!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
We're in the middle of Droite applications, so there's a lot 
of traffic around here! Come on, get movin!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Droite? 
Oh yeah～ the dance right! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Bamcham you're on the committee? 
Oh snap, TanMira's here too! ! Wassup～! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Droite huh～・・・ dancing with a date, it's so lovely. 
Me and my lady would be lovely too!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ruby, seems to be participating this year. 
She just registered——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wha！？ Princess～～～！！ 
Be my date～～～～～～！！！！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
・・・she didn't even ask if she has a date already. 
What's she gonna do if Ruby already decided, huh.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha. But it looks like she hasn't decided yet. 
I guess it's good timing.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Well, all of them are participating I see. 
I feel prevailing winds are coming.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Oh, are you participating too Zephyr? 
Have you already chosen a date?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
No. Such promises sometimes cause trouble. 
I will leave it to the winds, I want to dance.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Alright then, I'll register you as solo. 
Fill out the application over there——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Princess Princess Princess～～～～! ! ! ! Wait up! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ———Is there something I can help you with?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Please be my date! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ・・・・Are you referring to the Ligne Droite?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yeah! You're going right Princess! ? Dance with me! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I must apologize for the inconvenience, 
but I will have to postpone my reply for now.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I wish to be very careful in selecting my date, 
so please allow me time to consider.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Ehhhhh～！！ You can't decide now！？ Why not！？！？ 
I'm in shambles～…….

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: But it'll be super cute tho! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Princess! ! I'mma show you! ! 
Then, you'll definitely wanna be my date! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Excuse me?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
For real for real, I'mma go all out! 
I'll make you fall in love with me, so just watch! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Operation・Lovey Dovey♡Princess! ! LET'S GOOO～～～～! !
